tripDetails.title: Day trip to Luxor (private)
tripDetails.description: Experience an unforgettable day trip to Luxor - private and without sales events.
tripDetails.bookNowPayLater: Book now, pay later: Stay flexible - book now and pay later.
tripDetails.paymentMethods: Payment on site in cash in Euro, US Dollar, Swiss Francs or Egyptian Pounds or PayPal

qena.description: For a distance of about 220 kilometers in the Nile valley

restStop.description: You can use the bathroom or stretch your legs.

beforeLuxor.description: You will drive through many small and large cities, experience authentic Egyptian everyday life.

luxor.description: You visit the largest temple complex in the world with its gigantic hall of columns

westBank.description: Traditional local lunch, the world-famous Valley of the Kings, the magnificent royal tombs, the temple of Queen Hatshepsut on the terrace

return.description: To remember the impressions of the day or to watch the hustle and bustle on the banks of the Nile

hotel.description: Arrive at the hotel around eight in the evening

tripDetails.sampleReview: Our tour guide was very knowledgeable and patient with my 7 year old questions.

highlights.title: Highlights
highlights.valleyKings: Explore the Valley of the Kings and its fascinating tombs.
highlights.egyptHistory: Immerse yourself in the history of Egypt.
highlights.nileBoat: Enjoy a 45-minute boat ride on the Nile.
highlights.niltalBeauty: Experience the beauty of the Nile valley.
highlights.memnon: Marvel at the impressive Colossi of Memnon.
highlights.expressEntry: Enjoy express entry without waiting times for pickup and sightseeing.
highlights.expertGuide: Get exciting information about the sights from your expert tour guide.
highlights.massTourfree: Experience the tour away from mass tourism
highlights.itravelPro: With ITRAVELPRO discover your travel destination like never before

included.title: Included
included.transfers: All transfers with high-quality brand vehicles and with professional drivers.
included.entranceFees: Entrance fees for the mentioned sights: Karnak Temple, Valley of the Kings, Temple of Hatshepsut and Memnon Colossi.

notIncluded.title: Not included
notIncluded.extras: Any additional costs not mentioned in the itinerary

dontForget.title: Please don't forget
dontForget.alarm: Set an alarm at reception or set the alarm yourself.
dontForget.breakfast: Order your breakfast package one day before the start of the trip at reception.
dontForget.camera: Take your camera and video camera with you.
dontForget.headwear: Think of a head covering (cap, hat).
dontForget.sunProtection: Don't forget your sunglasses and sunscreen.
dontForget.documents: Please send us a copy of the passport or ID of all fellow travelers after booking. We need this for approval of the tour by the Egyptian authorities. Share with us after your arrival at the hotel your room number via SMS or WhatsApp so that we can organize your excursion.
